120864.「では……私 カジノのオーナー\n フォン・バルディが！\n 今回の勝負の 立会:
Well then, I, Von Baldi, owner of the Casino!
I will be your witness for this match.

120865.「ウェ～イ！ よろぴくぅ～！！\n マルコ師匠も 異存はないよね？:
Way~! Yoppikyuu~! Master Marko has no
objection, right?

120866.「へっ。おれは もう師匠じゃねえって\n なんべん言えば わかるんでい。\n …:
Heh. How many times do I have to tell you that
I'm not your master anymore? What the hell...

120867.「だが こう うるさく\n つきまとわれちゃ かなわねえからな。\n 今回だけは:
But I can't have you following me around like
this. For once, I'm going to treat you.

120868.「よろしい！\n では 今回のランプ錬金勝負に\n 何を賭けるかを 確認いたしま:
Very well! Now let's see what you are willing
to bet on this lamp smelting contest.

120869.「ヒゲのマルコ様が 負けたならば\n イカサマからは 足を洗い\n カタギの ラ:
If Mustached Marco loses, he will get out of
cheating and become a Lamp Alchemist!

120870.「マスター・ヴェキオ様が 負けたならば\n 生涯 マルコ様には 関わらない！\n:
If Guildmaster Vecchio loses, I will not be
involved with Marco for the rest of my life!
And...

120871.「それに 迷惑料として……\n １億ゴールド。\n 全額 キャッシュで払ってもら:
And 100 million gold for the inconvenience.
You promised to pay me in full in cash.

120872.「すばらしい！！\n かたや 己の生き様を。かたや 大金を賭けた\n 一世一代の:
Wonderful! On the one hand, it's your way of life. On the other hand, it's a once-in-a- generation game with a lot of money at
stake..!

120873.「どう？ <pc>ちゃん。\n この大勝負 マジ燃えるっしょ？\n 超・超・超！:
How's it going? <pc>. This big game
is really burning, isn't it? Super, super,
super! I'm counting on you!

120874.「ふん……。\n この ぱっとしねえガキが 相手かよ。\n ……この勝負 もらっ:
Hmm... This rather dull kid is my opponent. I
guess I've won this match.

120876.「ヒゲのマルコ様の提供による 素材とランプで\n ランプ錬金 上級で 最難関とさ:
Lamp smelting with materials and lamps
provided by Mustached Marco!

120877.「ただし！ 特技の使用は 一切なし！\n 生まれ持った 天運のみで勝負して\n:
However! No skill will be used at all! You
will compete only with your natural luck!

120878.「まずは 先攻が 錬金をおこない\n その後に 後攻が 同じアイテムに 重ねて\:
First, the first player performs the alchemy,
and then the second player performs the
alchemy on the same item!

120879.「……まずは ヒゲのマルコ様！\n ランプの前へ どうぞ。:
...First of all, Mr. Mustached Marco! Please
come to the lamp.

120880.ヒゲのマルコは ニヤリと笑いながら\n錬金ランプの ルーレットを回した！:
Mustached Marco spun the roulette wheel of the
alchemy lamp with a grin!

120881.「むむっ 聞きしに勝る 難易度ですな……。\n 大成功ゾーンは カミの毛より細い:
Hmmm, the difficulty level is beyond my
hearing...the perfection zone is thinner than
a hair... I'm starting to get the creeps!

120882.「へっ 黙って見てな。\n ……じきに ルーレットが止まるぜ。:
Shut up and watch. ...soon the roulette will
stop.

120883.「なんと！？ まさか 大成功とは……！\n ヒゲのマルコ様は \n すさまじい豪:
What a surprise! Mustached Marco seems to be a
man of tremendous luck...

120885.「へっ。見たか ヴェキ坊。\n ……さあ 今度は おめぇたちの番だ。:
Heh. Did you see that, Veki-boy? Now it's your
turn.

120887.「どういう結果でも オレ 後悔しないから\n 思いっきり やっちゃいなよ。\n:
Whatever the outcome, I have no regrets, so go
ahead and do your best. I believe in you,
<pc>!

120888.錬金ランプの ルーレットを 回しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to spin the roulette on the
alchemy lamp?<yesno><close>

120889.「なんでえ 怖じ気づいたか？\n おれは 気が短けぇんだ。さっさと やんな。:
Why, are you scared? I have a short temper.
Get on with it.

120890.「オレの <pc>ちゃんが\n ビビるわけ ないし！\n さー カッコイイとこ:
I don't think my <pc> will be
scared! Now, show me your cuckooii!

120891.錬金ランプの ルーレットを 回しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to spin the roulette on the
alchemy lamp?<yesno><close>

120892.<pc>は\n錬金ランプの ルーレットを回した！:
<pc> turned the roulette on the
alchemy lamp!

120893.「この キリキリと肌を刺すような緊張感。\n あぁ……たまりませんなあ……。:
The tension that pricks the skin. I can't get
enough of it...

120894.「……おお！\n <pc>様の ルーレットが 止まります！\n さて……結末は…:
Oh...oh! The roulette stops at <pc>!
Well...what's the ending?

120896.「はーっはっはっはっは！\n どうやら 失敗しちまったようだなぁ。: Ha ha ha ha! Looks like I screwed up.

120897.「約束は 覚えてるな？ １億ゴールドだ！\n １億ゴールド きっちり\n 耳をそ:
You remember our deal, don't you? 100 million
gold! 100 million gold, 100 million gold, and
I want you to pay me in full, ear to ear...

120899.「な な な なんですかっ 今のは！？\n まさか 隕石が\n 落ちてきたと い:
What the hell was that? Are you saying that a
meteorite fell on us?

120901.パルプンテが 起こった！\nふしぎなチカラが 集まってくる……！:
Hocus Pocus happened! Mysterious power
gathers..!

120902.なんと 失敗だった ＭＰ消費しない率 +5%が\nレアドロップ率 100倍に な:
What a failure! The +5% rate of not consuming
MP has been increased to 100 times the rare
drop rate!

120903.「ぐっ……！ ありえねえ！！\n こんな フザけたことが あるはずがねえっ！\n:
Ggh...! This is impossible! There's no way
this kind of nonsense is possible! I put
something in that lamp...

120907.「ああ……イカサマからは 足を洗う。\n 二度と ランプ錬金サギは やらねえよ。:
Ah... I'm getting out of the cheating
business. I'll never do lamp smelting again.
I'll become a crook.

120910.「おめぇ……たしか\n <pc>って 名前だったな。\n 奇跡の逆転勝利 おめで:
You...I think your name was <pc>.
Congratulations on your miraculous comeback
victory.

120911.「へっ そう 身構えるなって。\n おれは すっかり\n 戦意喪失しちまってんの:
Don't get so defensive. I'm completely
demoralized.

120912.「……じつはな。\n おれには 幸運の女神が 見えんのよ。:
The truth is... I can't see the goddess of
fortune.

120913.「昔……おれが まだ\n カタギの ランプ錬金職人だった頃\n 幸運の女神は い:
Back in the day... when I was still a working
Lamp Alchemist, the Goddess of Fortune was
always by my side.

120914.「どんな難しい錬金も 百発百中。\n 人は おれを 錬金の神と呼んだ。\n ……:
No matter how difficult the alchemy is, I
always get it right. People called me the god
of alchemy. Until I met the monk Vecchio.

120915.「幸運の女神ってのは 気まぐれな浮気モンでね。\n くたびれたジジイより\n ヴ:
Fortune is a fickle flirt. She chose Veki boy
over the tired old man.

120916.「……幸運の女神に 逃げられてから\n おれの錬金は さっぱり うまくいかねえ。:
I've had no luck at all with my alchemy since
the goddess of fortune ran away from me. But
customers come to me because of my reputation.

120917.「追い詰められた おれは とうとう\n サギに 手を染め……いつの間にか\n イ:
I was cornered, and I finally turned to the
art of the hare, and before I knew it, I was
down to a cheating alchemist.

120918.「……おっと。つい長居しちまった。\n ヴェキオのヤツに つかまる前に\n おれ:
Oops...I overstayed my welcome. I'm going to
go now before Vecchio catches up with me.

120919.「そうそう……\n あの日 おれから去って行った\n 幸運の女神だがな。:
Oh, yeah... the lucky girl who left me that
day.

120920.「<pc>。\n さっきの勝負が決まった あの瞬間……\n あんたの後ろに 立っ:
<pc>. I was standing right behind
you the moment the game was decided.

120923.「そっか……師匠 行っちゃったんだ。\n ちょーっと 冷たいんじゃーないのー？\:
I see...Master has gone. Aren't you a little
cold? I'm really depressed!

120924.「ま ラン錬を続けてたら おっちゃんにも\n また会えるっしょ……つか 絶対 会:
Well, I'm sure I'll see Pops again if I keep
up my run training...or I'll definitely see
him! I'll talk more about it another time.

120925.「<pc>ちゃん！\n そんじゃ 今回の報酬は ギルドのほうでね！:
<pc>! Well then, this time the
reward is on the guild's side!

164461.「両者が 錬金をおこなった後\n より難易度の高い 成功を出した者が\n この勝:
The winner of the competition is the one who
achieves the more difficult success after the
two players have refined their gold!

174007.レアドロップ率 1.5倍の 錬金に失敗して\nＭＰ消費しない率 +5%が 付いて:
Failure to alchemize 1.5x rare drop rate and
+5% rate of not consuming MP...
